DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Seed set in the studied Trollius europaeus populations
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Data on the number of produced seeds from Trollius europaeus populations. Number of ovules (column ovules_sum) and developing seeds (column seed_sum) were counted in five carpels per fruit.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: pollination
brood-site pollination
mutualism
pollinator loss
reproductive ecology
